pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======================Core Explore Oaipmh App=======================OAI-PMH exploration functions for curator core project.Quick start===========1. Add "core_explore_oaipmh_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting---------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_explore_oaipmh_app', ]2. Add "core_explore_oaipmh_app" to your DATA_SOURCES_EXPLORE_APPS setting--------------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python DATA_SOURCES_EXPLORE_APPS = [ 'core_explore_oaipmh_app', ]3. Include the core_explore_oaipmh_app URLconf in your project urls.py----------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^oaipmh_search/', include("core_explore_oaipmh_app.urls")),
